title: Treasures of the Holy Trinity-St. Sergius Lavra. Orthodox Encycl
description:
Contents:

History - a detailed chronology of events Trinity-Sergius Lavra supplemented by brief multimedia lectures on the history of Russia (XIV-XX centuries).

Excursions - Section includes 4 tours of the monastery.

Temple - Meet the architecture and interior design is all ancient monuments Lavra.

Art - In section presents icons, frescoes and decorative and applied arts Russian masters

The monastery - Section introduces lifestyle monastery, church hierarchy, celebrations and prayers. The three-dimensional model, you\\\&#039;ll know the internal and external appearance temple.
